thread.title: Instant noodles: Simple food, big impact on Chinese people's lives
thread.title_full: Instant noodles: Simple food, big impact on Chinese people's lives

title: Instant noodles: Simple food, big impact on Chinese people's lives
text: Instant noodles: Simple food, big impact on Chinese people's lives chinadaily.com.cn | 2017-01-04 06:45 A mother cuts instant noodles with her teeth, while her child opens her mouth waiting to be fed in a waiting lounge at Beijing West Railway station on Jan 18, 2006. Ting Hsin International Group recently announced that it is terminating its instant noodle brand 'Master Kong Taiwan'. Master Kong is one of the best-known types of instant noodles sold in China. This news triggers Chinese people to look back at their memories involving instant noodles. [Photo/VCG]
